S4.T1.caption: Table 1 :  Ablation study on each key component of our methods. ``Mask'' denotes the MaskGIT-like modeling, ``2D'' denotes the 2D postional encoding, and ``R'' denotes the Refiner.

S4.T2.caption: Table 2 :  Comparison with state-of-the-arts and various baselines.
references: In our comparative analysis, presented in Table 2, our method demonstrates superior performance over existing state-of-the-art methods across all FGD metrics. Notably, our approach shows significant advancements in FGD (Holistic), indicating its capacity for generating realistic holistic body motions. This can be attributed to our proposed unified probabilistic framework. Additionally, our method excels in Var (face), indicating its effectiveness in producing diverse facial expressions. Compared to the TalkShow model [59], our approach also achieves a higher FPS, highlighting both its efficiency and effectiveness.
